hopobject.name: LVDS LCD
hopobject.body: This small board is connected to two LCD headers on the bottom of BeagleBoard-xM (and original BeagleBoard), and provides simple interface to LVDS LCD panels like those you can find in notebooks. Schematic and Gerbers are available. Also, you can order bare PCB or fully assembled board.
hopobject.shortdesc: Additional PCB to connect (any?) LVDS LCD panel to BeagleBoard-xM.
